name: Colored Jellies!
description:
This is my first ever Game jam and i know the game sucks so please bear with me.

The Game is Simple. Shoot the Jellies with the right colored bullets.

Use A, S, D, F to change bullet colors and SPACEBAR to shoot.

Java 8 Comes shipped with the game

FIXED the bug where the game just wouldn't start. Had to Ship the game with Java.

Good luck!
